description: Discover the essence of Indian craftsmanship with Fab India! Explore our curated collection of deals on clothing, home decor, and accessories. Embrace Indian culture and save with our Fab India discount coupons.

posts.post_content: Get a contemporary look for your dinner table with this one of a kind table cover. Specially crafted from cotton, it is perfectly suitable for regular use. The light-hued table cover comes adorned with floral hand block prints on its spread. Showcase it for casual occasions that are graced with the light banter of friends and family.

Step into luxury with our woven harmony foot mat. Feel the gentle embrace of its intricate patterns as you embark on a journey of ultimate comfort. Designed to pamper your senses, this mat effortlessly combines style and functionality. Immerse your feet in blissful relaxation and indulge in a world of exquisite comfort.

Luxurious and absorbent, our cotton towel boasts an intricate woven pattern that adds a touch of elegance to your daily routine. Soft and gentle against your skin, it quickly absorbs moisture, leaving you feeling fresh and dry. Indulge in the perfect blend of style and functionality with this beautifully crafted towel.
posts.post_title: Teal Misha Cotton Pile Bath Towel Large

posts.post_content: FabIndia presents an elegant and stylish serving platter with a dip bowl that can be showcased during any casual, formal, or special occasion at your home. Made from ceramic, the round platter and bowl with embossed floral design can be used to keep salad, snacks, chips, dips or any other savouries for guests. It comes in a sublime hue.
posts.post_title: Pushp Embossed  Chip n Dip Platter-Green

posts.post_content: Upgrade your regular look with these attractive slim cropped pants from FabIndia. Crafted from the finest Cotton Firdaus fabric it is topped with a banded waist with side zip and made in a pleasing hue. Team it with a top or kurta to complete the look.
posts.post_title: Orange Cotton Slim Fit Casual Pant

posts.post_content: Stylish, functional, and versatile. Its durable cotton construction ensures long-lasting use, while the vibrant print adds a touch of personality. With ample storage space and convenient compartments, it keeps your essentials organized on the go. Travel with confidence using our must-have toiletry bag.

Hand block printed for unique charm, this towel combines softness and functionality. Its honeycomb texture offers optimal absorbency, while the hand block print adds a touch of artisanal elegance. Wrap yourself in luxury with this distinctive and practical addition to your bath routine.
posts.post_title: White Ira Cotton Hand Block Print Honeycomb Hand Towel

posts.post_content: Bored of the typical pants? Check out Fabindia's latest range of Cotton printed low crotch harmed pants with drawstring. These pants are stylish and comfortable.
posts.post_title: Cotton Low Crochet Printed Harem Pant

posts.post_content: Make your casual look more appealing with FabIndia's cotton flax print pants. Designed with a flat front, it has a regular-fit profile, featuring practical side pockets to keep your essentials handy topped with a banded elasticated waist. Team it with a crop top or shirt with a clutch bag and chappals for a complete ensemble.

Upgrade your regular look with these attractive slim pants from FabIndia. Crafted from the finest Viscose Tussar fabric it is topped with a banded waist with a front zip and made in a pleasing hue. Team it with a top or kurta to complete the look.

These heathered cotton pants will become a staple in your workwear rotation. Designed with a cropped fit, half-elastic banded waist, and side zipper, this basic silhouette can be work any time of year. Style it with a cotton button-down shirt and heels.

This remarkable and well-crafted lehenga set from FabIndia is an ethnic wardrobe essential for your little princess. It comes in a pleasing hue and is made from a luxurious cotton fabric. It features an embroidered round neck choli with pintuck pleat detail at the front, paired with a contrast hand block printed A-line skirt, finished with a contrast hem. Make your little one wear this attractive attire on any celebratory occasion like weddings and festivals.

Bored of the typicallcorporate formallwear Check out fabindia's latest range of Viscose Tussar plain pants. Slim fit with front zipper, this pant will go with all styles and colors. Comfort and style married into one look don't miss your chance to grab these pants!

Enjoy your next weekend outing with these straight-fit casual pants. They are made from rayon blend fabric, bedecked with an elegant Kalamkari print, and completed with a banded elastic waist and stylish front pockets. Wear it with a crop top, a sling bag, funky jewellery and sandals for a complete casual ensemble.

If you are looking for classic pants to accentuate your favourite tops then we have just what you need. These Lyocell Cotton stretch plain slim fit pants with front zipper silhouette are an essential.
posts.post_title: Cotton Lycra Slim Fit Stretch Pant

posts.post_content: For your little one, this Ikkat weave kurta and jacket set is the perfect piece. Made from cotton nagari fabric, the kurta has a Chinese collar, long sleeves, and flared hem. Style your little girl with this two piece kurta and jacket set along with pants for any traditional occasions.

Designed from a fine cotton fabric, adorn your little one with this easy-breezy chikankari frock. It has round neck, shoulder straps, flared hem. Style your girl with this frock and along with a pair of flats for the summer.

This remarkable and well-crafted lehenga set from FabIndia is an ethnic wardrobe essential for your little princess. It comes in a pleasing hue and is made from a luxurious cotton fabric. It features an embroidered round neck choli with pintuck pleat detail at the front, paired with a contrast hand block printed A-line skirt, finished with a contrast hem. Make your little one wear this attractive attire on any celebratory occasion like weddings and festivals.

This printed Bush shirt is made from breathable cotton lub which will keep your little one comfortable during the hot summers. It has chikankari hand embroidery, a chinese collar, long roll-up sleeves, and a button placket. You can style your child with this shirt along with jeans or shorts for a casual day look.

For your little one, this embroidered kurta is the perfect piece. Made from cotton slub fabric, the kurta has a round neck with a button, three-quarter sleeves, and flared hem. Style your little girl with this kurta and matching pyjamas for any traditional occasion.

A traditional ensemble that will redefine your child's look on any special day is this kurta and pyjama set. The red-coloured kurta with v-neck, full sleeves and agrakha design will make your kid look stylish and super cute. The bottom wear comes with an elasticated waistband which is gentle on your baby's tummy. Crafted from top-notch cotton material that ensures a soft touch to your kid's skin.
Versatile yet stylish, a cotton Nehru jacket works well and suits every occasion. It can be easily paired with a slim shirt or even a fitted t-shirt for an Indo-western look
posts.post_title: Blue Cotton Bana Chinese Collar Nehru Jacket

posts.post_content: This fashionable and stunning trouser, created and framed from fine cotton fabric is the perfect casual piece. It has a slim fit body, a waistband with belt loops, button and zip fly, and pockets. Pair it with a coloured shirt and sandals during the summer.
posts.post_title: Green Cotton Slim Fit Regular Pants

posts.post_content: Be in the spotlight by wearing this pair of slim-fit Drawstring Pants from Fabindia. Tailored to sartorial perfection from premium quality cotton fabric, it assures a soft and soothing touch against the skin. It also features a solid pattern. It offers relaxed and comfortable wear.

Wear this exclusive Pathani kurta from FabIndia for any casual or semi-formal occasion. Crafted from Cotton bana material, this comfort-fit kurta is in a deep hue. A regular collar and roll-up sleeves further accentuate its looks. It can be teamed with churidar or pyjama in a neutral hue.
Add a stylish touch to your lookby wearing this sleeveless Nehru jacket. Crafted from linen, it features Chinese collar and Dobby weave that ensures you get utmost comfort with style.

This Pathani kurta is made from breathable cotton poplin fabric. It has a regular collar, roll-up sleeves, a half button placket, regular fit, and side slits. You can style this Pathani kurta with pyjamas for any traditional occasion.

This Ajrak print kurta is made from breathable cotton cambric fabric. It has a Chinese collar, long sleeves, a half button placket, slim-fit, and side slits. You can style this kurta with pyjamas for any traditional occasion.
posts.post_title: Cotton Cambric Slim Fit Long Kurta

posts.post_content: Your contemporary wardrobe gets a fresh lease of life with this full-sleeved kurta. Crafted in Cotton Nagari, it features a Chinese Collar and unique Lucknavi embroidery designs that are sure to capture your attention.

This kurta is made from breathable cotton fabric. It has a Chinese collar, long sleeves, a half button placket, slim-fit, and side slits. You can style this kurta with pyjamas for any traditional occasion.
posts.post_title: Yellow Linen Calf Length Long Kurta

posts.post_content: Personalize your statement with this unique short kurta from Fabindia. Stitched from linen, it is durable and perfectly suited for spring and summer. This comfort-fit kurta comes with checks. Its style is further enhanced with a Chinese collar and rollup sleeves. You can team it with any pair of trousers or pants of your choice.

A timeless piece like this slim-fit long kurta promises to add a traditional yet regal flair to the wearer's everyday ensemble. This kurta is handcrafted with perfection in cotton fabric and is bedecked with a Chinese collar and full sleeves. It can be worn to add a touch of cultural allure to one's appearance and leave an indelible mark. Combine it with a churidar or pyjama and some jutties or Kolhapuri chappals to look your best at the next traditional event.
posts.post_title: NUIndian Black Cotton Slim Fit Long Kurta

posts.post_content: Look handsome in this FabIndia slim-fit long kurta when worn casually or in a more polished way with a churidar or pyjama and matching jutties for any casual occasion. Crafted from rich and breathable Cotton fabric with a geometric pattern it comes in a pleasing hue. It is topped with a tasteful round neck with side tassel ties, framed with full sleeves and cuff details.
posts.post_title: Purple Cotton Printed Slim Fit Long Kurta With Cuff

posts.post_content: Combining iconic style with meticulous craftsmanship, this cotton kurta makes for a perfect investment piece. The attractive print effortlessly melds a classic silhouette with a Chinese collar, long sleeves and two unique textured prints that enhance the timeless reputation of this kurta. It comes with the power to elevate any outfit, whether layered with a sleek Nehru jacket or paired with a plain white churidar pyjama and jutties.
posts.post_title: NUIndian Yellow Cotton Slim Fit Printed Long Kurta

posts.post_content: Fabindia showcases this exclusive long kurta that is ideal for casual wear. Stitched from the finest Cotton fabric, it comes with a Chinese collar and full sleeves. This slim-fit kurta is adorned with an enticing hand-block print and can be teamed with a churidar or pyjama in a dark hue to complete the look.
posts.post_title: Cotton Printed Slim Fit Long Kurta

posts.post_content: Expertly crafted from sterling silver with gold plating, this rakhi portrays utmost perfection. Tie it up around your brother's wrist with a red thread and watch him flaunt it with pride.

Traditions will never go out of style and so will this delicately exquisitely rakhi, embellished with a dash of silver.?Simple and subtle,?this piece is a perfect symbol of affection that you have for your brother's other half.

This vibrant short kurta is a delight to wear since it has a timeless charm that never goes out of style. The sumptuous purple colour adorned with a resplendent striped print and the plush softness of the viscose fabric serve as the foundation for this kurta's overall appearance. It comes with a Chinese collar and long sleeves and has pockets on the side. For casual occasions, the kurta would look best paired with plain trousers and brogues or with pyjamas and Kolhapuri chappals.
posts.post_title: NUIndian Purple Viscose Silk Slim Fit Printed Short Kurta

It is accompanied by comfortable and adorable pants with elastic banded waist and pockets.
